ThingDef.Name: BaseDisposableLGIS
ThingDef.description: Minature missile with low-end laser guidance, designed to be carried by infantry or light armored vehicles, capable of beam-riding guidance, inertia guidance or unguided dumb fire. The missile comes in protective packaging that can also be used as a disposable launcher.

ThingDef.Name: BaseDisposableLGISammo
ThingDef.description: Minature missile with low-end laser guidance, designed to be carried by infantry or light armored vehicles, capable of beam-riding guidance, inertia guidance or unguided dumb fire. The missile comes in protective packaging that can also be used as a disposable launcher, but it is also used to feed various LGIS launchers.

RecipeDef.label: make minelayer LGIS tube with ADM
RecipeDef.description: Craft a minelayer LGIS tube with existing ADM mines.

RecipeDef.label: dismaltle minelayer LGIS for ADM
RecipeDef.description: Open up a minelayer LGIS to retrive the ADM mines inside, but.....why?
